card.name: All-Out Attack
card.property: Until end of turn > When one of your characters attacks, you may attack with another untapped character that has not already attacked this turn.

card.name: Ancient Security Tentacle
card.property:
Put on [Quintesson] [Specialists] only.
Damage counters can't be moved from other characters to the upgraded character.
Up to 3 [Tentacles] can fit in 1 Weapon slot.

card.name: Angolmois Surge
card.property:
Do 1 damage to one of your [Melee] characters > It gains +4[ATK] until end of turn.
If you have Unicron, Chaos Bringer on your starting team > Put 1 Chaos Counter on him.

card.name: Aquatic Maneuvers
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your [Quintessons], [Boats], or [Seacons] defends.
[When Revealed] > The defender gets +2 [DEF] until end of battle. When you flip one or more [B] this battle, reduce the attacker's [Pierce] total by 1 for each [B] you flipped.

card.name: Are These Wires Important?
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your Beasts, Dinobots, Firecons, Predacons, or your Dazzlestrike, Lionizer, Ravage, Steeljaw, or Trypticon defends.
[When Revealed] > Scrap all the attacker's Utilities.

card.name: Armed To The Teeth
card.property: You may play any number of Weapons onto your characters.

card.name: Aspect of Bitterness
card.property:
Put on [Quintesson] [Leaders] or [Quintesson] [Specialists] only.
When this leaves the battlefield > One of your [Quintessons] gets +2[ATK] and +2[DEF] until end of turn.

card.name: Aspect of Death
card.property:
Put on [Quintesson] [Leaders] or [Quintesson] [Specialists] only.
When the upgraded character is attacked > Put a death counter on this.
When this leaves the battlefield > Do damage to an enemy equal to the number of death counters on this.

card.name: Aspect of Doubt
card.property:
Put on [Quintesson] [Specialists] with a bot mode only.
When you put this on a character > Untap that character. Repair 2 damage from it.

card.name: Allicon Aronik, Killer Croc
card.property:
When this defends > [Plan 1].
When this defends against a non-Specialist character > The attacker can’t use [Pierce] this battle.

alternate.name: Allicon Aronik, Killer Croc
alternate.property: When this attacks and you flip at least [B] > This gets +[ATK] equal to the number of damage counters on him.

card.name: Brace For Impact
card.property:
When your Ramjet, Sky Smasher is upgraded with an Armor and defends while in alt mode > Flip him to bot mode.
When your Ramjet, Sky Smasher is upgraded with a Weapon and attacks while in bot mode > Flip him to alt mode.

card.name: Aspect of Laughter
card.property:
Put on [Quintesson] [Leaders] or [Quintesson] [Specialists] only.
If one of your cards would cause you to scrap one or more [G] cards from your hand > Instead scrap that many cards minus 1 from your hand.

card.name: Aspect of Rage
card.property:
Put on [Quintesson] [Leaders] or [Quintesson] [Specialists] only.
When you put this on a character > Move 1 damage counter from the upgraded character to another character. Then do 1 damage to a character.

card.name: Assuming Control
card.property: Choose a character in your KO area. You may add its [ATK] to the total [ATK] of any [Quintesson] [Specialist] with a bot mode, Bombshell, Dr. Arkeville, Megaempress, Mindwipe, Soundblaster, Soundwave, Tarantulas, or Trypticon until end of turn. Then put this card into your KO area.

card.name: Black Mail
card.property: When the upgraded character takes attack damage and isn't KO'd > If the upgraded character is a [Mercenary], move 1 damage counter from it to one of your other characters.

card.name: Bomb Removal Protocol
card.property: If one or more damage counters would be moved onto one of your characters from an opponent's character > Move those damage counters to this instead. Then, if this has 2 or more damage counters on it, scrap it.

card.name: CNA-Encoded Armory
card.property: Do 1 damage to one of your [Melee] characters > Return an Upgrade with “Put on [Melee] characters only” from your scrap pile to your hand.

card.name: Demolition Derby
card.property:
If your opponent has at least twice the number of characters on the battlefield than you do > One of your characters gets +2[ATK] until end of turn.
When that character would do enough attack damage to KO an enemy this turn > If your opponent has at least twice the number of characters on the battlefield than you, untap your character.

card.name: Discordant Cacophony
card.property:
[Reveal] > After your opponent chooses an attacker, has at least one untapped character, and you have at least two [Motorcycles], Blaster, Frenzy, Hellbat, Jazz, Nightscream, Soundblaster, Soundwave, Tarantulas, or Transmutate.
[When Revealed] > The attacker untaps and the opponent chooses a different attacker.

card.name: Dreadful Feast
card.property: Choose two characters on the same team. Move 1 damage counter from each to a third character on the same team.

card.name: "Dutch"
card.property:
While this is on a [Mercenary] > It has +1 [ATK].
While the upgraded character battles and you flip your first [W] > Flip 1 extra battle card.

card.name: Brutal Conditioning
card.property:
Once per game, when one of your [Melee] characters takes damage from your cards > You may put this on that character.
When the character this is on takes damage from one of your cards > Put a conditioning counter on this. Then if this has three or more conditioning counters, flip this.

alternate.name: Brutal Conditioning
alternate.property: When the character this is on is KO'd > Put this into your KO area.

card.name: Allicon Eyuk, Bog Scavenger
card.property:
[Tough 1]
When you flip to this mode > Return a [G] or [K] Upgrade from your scrap pile to hand.

alternate.name: Allicon Eyuk, Bog Scavenger
alternate.property: When this attacks a non-[Melee] character and you flip at least [B] > This gets +1[ATK] until end of battle for each [B] you flipped.

card.name: Energy Conversion Field
card.property:
[Reveal] > If an opponent's card would do non-attack damage to more than one of your characters.
[When Revealed] > Instead repair 1 damage from all of your characters.

card.name: Forked Tentacle
card.property:
Put on [Quintesson] [Specialists] only.
When you [TAP] > If one of your abilities would make you choose one effect, you may choose two of those effects instead.
Up to 3 [Tentacles] can fit in 1 Weapon slot.

card.name: Gift of Innermost Energon
card.property: Do 1 damage to each of your characters. If no characters are KO'd this way, choose one of your characters and repair damage from it equal to the total amount of damage done this way.

card.name: Give Me Your Face
card.property: When an enemy [Titan Master] deploys this turn > Tap it.

card.name: Guilty or Innocent
card.property: Choose one of your [Sharkticons] or [Allicons]. When it attacks an enemy this turn, choose one > • The defender's [DEF] becomes 0 during this battle. • Enemies can't use [Tough] this battle.

card.name: Insurance Write-Off
card.property:
Put on [Allicons] and [Sharkticons] only.
When the upgraded character is KO'd > Draw 2 cards. If at least one of the drawn cards is a [Quintesson] card, you may reveal it. If you do, draw another card.

card.name: Judicial Discretion
card.property: Do 1 damage to a character or repair 1 damage from a character. Then, if you have a [Judge] or Tyrest on the battlefield, repeat this once.

card.name: Litigious Tentacle
card.property:
Put on [Quintesson] [Specialists] only.
The upgraded character has +2 [HEALTH].
Up to 3 [Tentacles] can fit in 1 Weapon slot.

card.name: Loading The Cannon
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your characters defends.
[When Revealed] > That character gets +1[DEF] until end of battle. After the battle, if the amount of attack damage that character took was less than or equal to its [DEF] before flips, put this card into your KO area.

card.name: Lose The Battle...
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your characters defends.
[When Revealed] > Return a Weapon from your scrap pile to your hand.

card.name: Buried Banquet
card.property: When your Allicon Eyuk, Bog Scavenger attacks > You may put a [K] or [G] Upgrade from your opponent's scrap pile into their KO area. If you do, repair 1 damage from her.

card.name: Alpha Sentinel, Dark Guardian Relic
card.property: At the start of each turn, if all untapped enemies have 10[STARS] or more total > Each of your characters get +1[DEF] until end of turn for each of your other characters.

alternate.name: Alpha Sentinel, Dark Guardian Relic
alternate.property: When one of your characters takes attack damage, choose one > • You may do 1 damage to this. If you do, do 1 damage to the attacker after the battle. • You may do 1 damage to this. If you do, repair 1 damage from one of your other characters after the battle.

card.name: Lost In Transit
card.property:
[Reveal] > As your opponent plays an [K] Action.
[When Revealed] > Scrap that Action and it has no effect.

card.name: Maceration Laser
card.property:
Put on [Quintessons] only.
While the upgraded character is attacking an enemy from a different faction > It has [Pierce 2].

card.name: Manipulate Time
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your characters defends.
[When Revealed] > That character gets [Tough] equal to the number of [Quintessons] you have on the battlefield until end of battle. When you flip battle cards this battle, if that character's upgrades include at least [O][K][B][G][G] and you flip at least [O][K][B][G][G], your character takes no attack damage this battle and you untap all your characters.

card.name: Masher Mace
card.property:
[Bold 1]
When this is scrapped from a [Sharkticon] > Return this to your hand.

card.name: Motorcycle Chase
card.property: Tap one of your untapped [Motorcycles] > Your opponent chooses one of their untapped characters that has 10[STARS] or fewer and taps it. That character gets [Brave] until end of turn.

card.name: Occupation
card.property:
Draw 2 cards. Then scrap 2 cards from your hand.
If you began the game with only [Quintesson] characters > You may play a [G] card.

card.name: Open Agenda
card.property: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put up to 2 of those cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Opportune Protection
card.property:
[Reveal] > If one of your [Quintessons] would take damage and you had a [Mercenary] on your starting team.
[When Revealed] > You may have one of your other characters take up to 3 of that damage and your [Quintesson] take the rest.

card.name: Photon Charge
card.property:
When the upgraded character attacks and has 1[DEF] or less > Do 1 damage to it.
When the upgraded character does attack damage to an enemy > Do 1 damage to another enemy.
After the upgraded character attacks > Scrap this card.

card.name: Polarity Gauntlet
card.property: When the upgraded character defends > Reduce the attacker's [Bold] total by the attacker's [DEF].

card.name: Armada, Herald of Shrouds
card.property:
This has [Stealth] while tapped.
This has +1[ATK] and +1[DEF] for each of your untapped [Spaceships].

alternate.name: Armada, Herald of Shrouds
alternate.property: When your opponent uses a [TAP] ability of one of their characters, or an opponent's card causes exactly one of their characters to untap > Untap this or one of your [Spaceships] that has the same number of [STARS] or fewer than the enemy. Then flip this.

card.name: Cantankerous Attitude
card.property: When you play an Upgrade on Dinobot Slug, Hot-Headed Warrior > You may scrap an Upgrade on one of your other characters. If you do, do 2 damage to an enemy. When he defends > You may scrap an Upgrade on him after the battle. If you do, move 1 damage counter from him onto the attacker.

card.name: Polydermal Graft
card.property:
Put on [Melee] characters only.
When you put this on a character > Do 1 damage to it.
The upgraded character has +4[HEALTH].

card.name: Prime's New Arm
card.property:
Put only on a damaged Optimus Prime.
The upgraded character has +2[HEALTH].
This cannot be scrapped by the opponent’s cards.

card.name: Reroute Enemy Vectors
card.property:
[Reveal] > At the beginning of your opponent's turn.
[When Revealed] > Choose one of your characters and an enemy. If your chosen character would take attack damage from the chosen enemy, instead it takes half that damage rounded down.

card.name: Scrounging For Energon
card.property: Choose a battle icon color. Then your opponent reveals the top card of their deck. If it has a battle icon of the chosen color, you draw two cards and your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it.

card.name: Secret Missive
card.property: When you put this on a character > Draw a card. Return a [G] Secret Action from the scrap pile to your hand.

card.name: Sharkticon Matrix
card.property:
Put on [Leaders] only.
Each of your [Quintesson] [Melee] characters has +1[ATK] and [Pierce 1].

card.name: Shield Crash
card.property: Choose one of your characters. If its [DEF] is less than its [ATK], it gets -[ATK] and +[DEF] equal to the difference until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +[ATK] and -[DEF] equal to that difference.

card.name: Sidecar Artillery
card.property: When the upgraded character attacks and has 3 [ATK] or less > After the battle, do 2 damage to an enemy and scrap this.

card.name: Squid Pro Quo
card.property: Move up to 2 damage counters from one of your [Quintessons] to one of your [Decepticons]. Until end of turn, that [Decepticon] gets +[ATK] equal to the number of damage counters moved onto it this turn.

card.name: Stim Shock
card.property:
[Reveal] > When an enemy attacks.
[When Revealed] > Do 1 damage to each enemy that has [Bold]. Then reduce each enemy’s [Bold] total by 3 until end of turn.

card.name: Cerebro-Shell Shock
card.property: When your Bombshell, Insecticon Mind-Controller defends while tapped against a damaged enemy > The attacker can't flip more than 4 battle cards this battle.

card.name: Autobot Countdown, Aerospace Commander
card.property:
This has [Stealth] while untapped.
When this, your [Guardian], or your Omega Supreme takes 2 or more attack damage without being KO’d > Move 1 damage counter from it to the attacker.

alternate.name: Autobot Countdown, Aerospace Commander
alternate.property:
This has +[ATK] equal to the lowest [ATK] from among your Omega Supremes or Guardians in your KO area.
This has +[DEF] equal to the lowest from among your Omega Supremes or Guardians in your KO area.

card.name: Subcontractor Agreement
card.property: If you would use a [Bounty] ability of the upgraded character > You may instead use a [Bounty] ability of one of your cards.

card.name: Tetrinite Micro-Lining
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your characters defends.
[When Revealed] > That character gets +2[DEF] until end of battle. If it has an Armor, reduce the attacker's [Pierce] total by 4 until end of battle.

card.name: The Dweller Awakens
card.property:
[Reveal] > When your opponent plays an Action that reveals or triggers a Secret Action.
[When Revealed] > Choose one: • Do 1 damage to each enemy. • Do 2 damage to one enemy.

card.name: Thermal Sealant
card.property: When the upgraded character defends against an attacker with [Pierce] and you flip at least [O] > Reduce the attacker's [Pierce] total by 1 for each [O] you flipped this battle.

card.name: Touch of Quintessa
card.property:
[Reveal] > If one of your [Quintessons] would take enough attack damage to be KO’d.
[When Revealed] > Repair damage from that character equal to the number of [G] each player flipped this battle before it takes that attack damage. Then put this card into your KO area.

card.name: Turnabout Snare
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your characters defends.
[When Revealed] > Swap the attacker's base [ATK] and base [DEF] until end of battle.

card.name: Underbase Fragment
card.property:
Put on [Specialists] only.
When the upgraded character is tapped > Return a Tech Research or an Upgrade with “Superior” in its name from the scrap pile to your hand.

card.name: United Against Tyranny
card.property:
Choose one of your [Autobots]. It gets +2[ATK] until end of turn.
Choose an enemy [Decepticon]. It gets -2[DEF] until end of turn.

card.name: Universal Greeting
card.property: Choose an [Autobot] character and another character that is either a [Quintesson] or [Junkion]. Make a choice for each of your chosen characters > • It gets [Bold 1] until end of turn. • It gets [Pierce 2] until end of turn. • Repair 1 damage from it.

card.name: Unsavory Leftovers
card.property:
Put on [Allicons] and [Sharkticons] only.
When the upgraded character is KO'd > You may return a [O] Weapon or [B] Armor from the scrap pile to your hand.

card.name: Colossal Cannons
card.property: When your Gilthor, Chained Amalgamation does attack damage to an [Autobot] or [Decepticon] that's not a [Leader] > Do 1 damage to an enemy that shares a faction with the defender.

card.name: Autobot Pipes, Idiosyncratic Collector
card.property: If one of your [Boats] or characters with two alt modes would take 2 or more attack damage > Instead you may have this take 2 of that damage and your other character take the rest.

alternate.name: Autobot Pipes, Idiosyncratic Collector
alternate.property: When an Upgrade with one or more battle icons is scrapped from one of your other characters > You may reveal the top card of your deck. If you do and it has the same number of battle icons as the scrapped Upgrade, you may put the scrapped Upgrade on this.

card.name: Vorpal Fangs
card.property: When the upgraded character attacks and you flip battle cards > If you flipped at least [G][G][G][G], scrap this card. If you didn't, reduce the defender's [DEF] by 1 until end of battle for each you [G] flipped.

card.name: What Lies Beyond
card.property:
[Reveal] > When an enemy returns to the battlefield from the KO area, or an enemy is KO'd by an opponent's card without doing damage to it.
[When Revealed] > Do 2 damage to an enemy. Tap any characters that returned to the battlefield from the KO area. If the opponent would take an extra turn, they skip that turn instead.

card.name: Whipped Into Shape
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your [Melee] characters defends.
[When Revealed] > Do 1 damage to that character. It gets +4 [DEF] until end of battle.

card.name: Dark Regeneration
card.property: At the start of the first turn > Move any number of damage counters from your Optimus Prime, Dark Awakening to another character, but not enough to KO it.

card.name: Autobot Powerglide, Haughty Show-Off
card.property:
When this battles and you flip at least one [B] Weapon > At the end of battle, you may swap a card from your hand with one of the [B] Weapons you flipped this battle.
This can’t flip to its Upgrade side.
When this is KO’d > Play its Upgrade side.

alternate.name: S2 Thermal Reciprocator
alternate.property:
When the upgraded character attacks and the defender flips at least [K][K] > This has [Pierce] equal to this Upgrade’s [ATK].
If this would leave the battlefield > Put it into your KO area instead.

alternate.name: Autobot Powerglide, Haughty Show-Off
alternate.property:
If 1 or more damage counters would be moved onto one of your other characters from an enemy > Move those counters onto this instead. Then, if this is not KO'd, repair 1 damage from it.
This can’t flip to its Upgrade side.
When this is KO’d > Play its Upgrade side.

card.name: Death Crystal Cannon
card.property: When one of your characters that has 7[STARS] or more attacks and you have Sergeant Kup, Veteran Sergeant on the battlefield > Do damage to the defender equal to the number of Loading the Cannon cards in the KO area.

card.name: Axor, Opportunistic Fencer
card.property: When one of your other characters battles > You may move a Weapon or Armor from them to this after the battle. If that character is a [Mercenary], use one of its [Bounty] abilities.

card.name: Energon Reclamation
card.property:
When your Autobot Novastar, Search and Rescue is in bot mode and does attack damage > Put a fuel counter on this and flip her to alt mode after the battle.
During the main phase of your turn > You may repair damage from one of your characters equal to the number of fuel counters on this. If you do, flip this.

card.name: Crashbash, Ocean Terror
card.property: When this attacks and flips a number of [O] less than or equal to his [DEF] > This gets +2[ATK] until end of battle.

alternate.name: Crashbash, Ocean Terror
alternate.property: When this does attack damage to an enemy without KO’ing it and you flipped at least [O][B] > You may move that damage from that enemy to another enemy.

card.name: Decepticon Doublecrosser, Shield Brothers
card.property: When an enemy [Titan Master] deploys during your turn while this is untapped > You get an extra attack this turn, but only with this against that [Titan Master]. This may attack as though that [Titan Master] were tapped.

alternate.name: Crossguard 2X
alternate.property:
After the attacker flips battle cards while this is defending > Reduce the attacker's [Pierce] total by this character's [DEF].
If this would leave the battlefield > Put it into your KO area instead.

card.name: Enterprising Spotlight
card.property: If your starting team is only [Mercenaries] > Your deck can have up to 2 extra [STARS] of [K] cards.

card.name: Decepticon Exhaust, Consumptive Condottiere
card.property:
At the start of each turn > You may do 1 damage to this.
Each turn, this has +1[ATK] and +1[DEF] for each time he has taken damage or has had damage counters moved onto him during that turn.

alternate.name: Decepticon Exhaust, Consumptive Condottiere
alternate.property:
When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy > Use this card's [Bounty] ability.
[Bounty] > Move 1 damage counter from this to another character.

card.name: Forbidden Sorcery
card.property: Your deck can have up to 2 extra [STARS] of battle cards with no battle icons.

card.name: Deliberata, Judger and The Judged
card.property: [TAP] Choose one • Scrap a [G] card from your hand. If you do, reveal the two 2 cards of your deck. If they include at least [G], put both of them into your hand. Otherwise, scrap them. • Scrap cards from your hand equal to 3 minus the number of [Tentacles] on this. Then untap one of your Quintessons that has 4[STARS] or fewer.

card.name: Hit Me With That Beat
card.property: When your Autobot Jazz, Special Ops defends in alt mode against an attacker that has [Pierce] and you flip at least [W][W] > Do 1 damage to Autobot Jazz, Special Ops. He can't take more attack damage for this attack than the number of damage counters already on him.

card.name: General Ghyrik, Grievous Executioner
card.property:
Enemies have -1[HEALTH] during your turn.
When this attacks > Choose an enemy character. This gets [Bold] and [Pierce] until end of turn equal to the number of battle icons on their Utilities. Then scrap a Utility from that character.

card.name: In The Name of Slingshot
card.property:
Before the game begins, if your starting team was all [Aerialbots] > Deploy an Autobot Powerglide, Haughty Show-Off you own from outside the game to the battlefield in alt mode.
At the start of the first turn > Put 1 damage counter on each of four of your [Aerialbots].

card.name: Gilthor, Chained Amalgamation
card.property:
This has [Bold] equal to the number of [Tentacles] you have on the battlefield.
When you flip to this mode > Do 1 damage to an enemy. You may flip that enemy to another mode.

alternate.name: Gilthor, Chained Amalgamation
alternate.property:
This has +[DEF] equal to the number of [Tentacles] you have on the battlefield.
When this character defends and the attacker flips at least [O][K] > doesn’t give [Pierce] this battle.

card.name: Indigestion
card.property: Your Sharkticon Gnaw, Gluttonous Gourmand has “Once per game, [TAP], Scrap all cards from under this > Do damage to a tapped enemy equal to the number of cards scrapped this way. Flip Indigestion.”

card.name: Inquisitor Drebzik, Exhaustive Interrogator
card.property: [TAP] Choose one • Scrap a [G] card from your hand. If you do, reveal the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck. You may scrap any number of them. Put the rest back on top of their deck in any order. • Choose a [Titan Master] in head mode. Until end of turn, that [Titan Master]’s bonus does not apply to the character it's on.

card.name: Kneel Before Us
card.property: The character Mind Control Helmet is on has [Brave].

card.name: Klementia, Medical Magistrate
card.property: [TAP] Choose one • Scrap a card from your hand. If you do, repair 1 damage from a character. If the scrapped card is a [Quintesson] card, instead repair 2 damage from that character. • Any character gets +[ATK] or -[ATK] equal to the number of [Tentacles] on this until end of turn.

card.name: Localized Tremors
card.property:
When your Alpha Sentinel, Dark Guardian Relic is on the battlefield and two or more enemies untap > Your opponent chooses one of their Upgrades and scraps it.
When an enemy untaps and its [DEF] is less than your Alpha Sentinel, Dark Guardian Relic’s [DEF] > Do 1 damage to that enemy.

card.name: Lokos
card.property: [Head] + When this battles > [Plan 2]

alternate.name: Lokos
alternate.property: When this battles > [Plan 2].

card.name: Magnetic Boomerang
card.property: When an opponent's card scraps an Upgrade from your Raider Ion Storm, Infantry • Rainmaker while he is in alt mode > Return that Upgrade to your hand.

card.name: Mind Control Collar
card.property: [Head] + When this character battles > It gets your choice of [Bold 1], [Pierce 1], or [Focus 1] until end of battle.

alternate.name: Mind Control Collar
alternate.property: When you deploy this from under a character > KO this.

card.name: Mass Displacement Drive
card.property: When your Major Soundwave, Espionage • Spy flips to alt mode > He has 5[STARS] while he is in alt mode.

card.name: Mind Control Helmet
card.property: [Head] + When this character battles > It gets your choice of [Tough 1], or [Safeguard 3] until end of battle; or [Plan 1].

alternate.name: Mind Control Helmet
alternate.property: When you deploy this from under a character > KO this.

card.name: Nebulous Spotlight
card.property: If your starting team is only [Quintessons] > Your deck can have up to 2 extra [STARS] of cards.

card.name: Nacelle, Eager Aerospace Engineer
card.property: Your [Decepticons] with no printed abilities have +1[ATK] and +1[DEF].

alternate.name: Nacelle, Eager Aerospace Engineer
alternate.property: You may play an extra Upgrade each turn, but only on a [Decepticon] with no printed abilities.

card.name: Orbital Command

property.name: Stratagem Target
property.value: Captain Omega Supreme, Transport • City Defender

card.property:
Your Captain Omega Supreme, Transport • City Defender has the [Guardian] trait.
Before the game begins > Deploy an Autobot Countdown, Aerospace Commander you own from outside the game to the battlefield in alt mode.

card.name: Optimus Prime, Dark Awakening
card.property:
At the start of the game > Do 2 damage to this.
When you flip to this mode > Return a [G] card from your scrap pile to hand.

alternate.name: Optimus Prime, Dark Awakening
alternate.property: For each Upgrade on this that has a faction > Your characters that do not share a faction with that Upgrade get +1[ATK] if it's a Weapon, +1[DEF] if it's an Armor, and +1[HEALTH] if it's a Utility.

card.name: Pit of Judgement
card.property:
This begins the game with swarm counters equal to the number of [Quintessons] on your starting team.
During the main phase of your turn, if you have a [Judge] on the battlefield > You may scrap 3 [G] cards from your hand and remove a swarm counter from this. If you do, return a [Sharkticon] that has 4[STARS] or less from your KO area to the battlefield fully repaired.

card.name: Rabblerouser, Aerial Onslaught
card.property:
This has +3[ATK] while attacking a [Quintesson].
When you flip to this mode > Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it into your hand.

alternate.name: Rabblerouser, Aerial Onslaught
alternate.property:
This has +3[ATK] while attacking a [Junkion].
When one of your [Planes] attacks > [Plan 1].

card.name: Quite A Haul
card.property: When one of your [Mercenaries] does enough attack damage to KO an enemy > You may use that [Mercenary's] [Bounty] ability.

card.name: Red Wizard, Ruler of Menonia
card.property: When one of your characters attacks and you flip at least one card with no battle icons > After the battle, you may swap a card from your hand for a card you flipped with no battle icons.

alternate.name: Mara-Al-Utha, Usurper of Menonia
alternate.property: When you play a battle card that has exactly 1[STAR] > Your opponent reveals the top three cards of their deck. Look at your opponent’s hand. You may swap any of the revealed cards with any of the cards from their hand. Put the rest on top of your opponent's deck in any order.

card.name: Sound The Alarm
card.property: When your Autobot Pipes, Idiosyncratic Collector is KO'd > Choose one of your characters. Flip this, add its stats to your chosen character's stats, and return a card with [Brave] or [Stealth] in its text box from your scrap pile to your hand.

alternate.name: Sound The Alarm
alternate.property: When the character this is on is KO'd > Put this into your KO area.

card.name: Savage Wheelie, Rhymer Climber
card.property:
(before the game begins / just like you planned / reveal an Energon Slingshot from your deck / and put it in your hand)
When this defends and both players flip at least [O] → The attacker gets -1[ATK] this battle for each [O] you flipped, up to the number of [O] the opponent flipped.

alternate.name: Savage Wheelie, Rhymer Climber
alternate.property: When this attacks and both players flip at least [B] > The defender gets -1[DEF] this battle for each [B] you flipped, up to the number of [B] the opponent flipped.

card.name: Squeeze Play
card.property: Your deck can have up to 2 extra [STARS] of cards with both [O] and [B].

card.name: Sharkticon Biter, Brazen Berserker
card.property:
When this attacks > [Plan 1].
When this attacks and you flip at least [W][O][G] > You may attack with one of your other [Sharkticons].

alternate.name: Sharkticon Biter, Brazen Berserker
alternate.property: When this returns to the battlefield from the KO area > One of your characters gets [Bold 2] until end of turn.

card.name: Stuck On You
card.property: If your starting team has only two characters > Each of your characters has an additional Armor slot. During the main phase of your turn, you may put an Armor from your scrap pile or KO area onto one of your characters. If you do, flip this.

alternate.name: Stuck On You
alternate.property: If your starting team has only two characters > Each of your characters has an additional Armor slot.

card.name: Sharkticon Chomp, Craving Carnivore
card.property:
[Focus 1]
When this attacks and you flip at least [K][G] > You may untap one of your [Quintesson] [Specialists] with a bot mode.

alternate.name: Sharkticon Chomp, Craving Carnivore
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > You may play an [G] Upgrade.

card.name: The Last Line of Defense
card.property:
Your Omega Supreme, Autobot Defense Base has [Brave] and an additional Utility slot.
When one or more enemies untap while your Omega Supreme, Autobot Defense Base is on the battlefield > You may scrap a card from hand. If you do, move a damage counter from one of your characters to one of your opponent’s characters.

card.name: Sharkticon Gnaw, Gluttonous Gourmand
card.property:
This has +1[HEALTH] for each card under him.
When you flip to this mode > You may draw a card.

alternate.name: Sharkticon Gnaw, Gluttonous Gourmand
alternate.property:
This has +1[HEALTH] for each card under him.
When you flip to this mode > You may reveal a non-[G] card from your hand and put it under this.

card.name: The Solo Job
card.property: If you have exactly one [Mercenary] on your starting team > Your deck can have up to 2 extra [STARS] of [K] cards.

card.name: Sharkticon Peck, Protoform Pup
card.property:
This has [Stealth] while untapped.
When more than one of your characters untaps > Return a [O] card from your scrap pile to your hand.

alternate.name: Sharkticon Peck, Protoform Pup
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > Each of your [Sharkticons] and [Allicons] gets [Bold 1] until end of turn.

card.name: Thermal Reciprocation
card.property:
When your Autobot Powerglide, Haughty Show-Off takes damage from an opponent's card or has one or more damage counters moved onto him from an opponent's card > Put a thermal counter on this.
When your Autobot Powerglide, Haughty Show-Off is KO'd and you play his Upgrade side > Flip this.

alternate.name: Thermal Reciprocation
alternate.property: When a character upgraded with your S2 Thermal Reciprocator does attack damage > You may remove one or more thermal counters from this. If you do, do damage to the defender equal to the number of thermal counters removed.

card.name: Shockblast, Galactic Man
card.property:
When you flip to this mode > Each player draws a card.
This can’t flip to its Upgrade side.
When this is KO'd > Play its Upgrade side.

alternate.name: Astro Magnum
alternate.property:
When the upgraded character is a [Mercenary] and does enough attack damage to KO an enemy > Use this card's [Bounty] ability if the upgraded character’s current mode does not have any other [Bounty] abilities.
[Bounty] > Do 1 damage to an enemy. Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it.
If this would leave the battlefield > Put it into your KO area instead.

alternate.name: Shockblast, Galactic Man
alternate.property:
When you flip to this mode > Reveal the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck. You may put any number of them on the bottom of that deck. Put the rest back on top in any order.
This can’t flip to its Upgrade side.
When this is KO’d > Play its Upgrade side.

card.name: Third Party Brigade
card.property:
Before the game begins, if your starting team was all [Combaticons] > Deploy a Shockblast, Galactic Man you own from outside the game to the battlefield in alt mode.
When one of your [Combaticons] attack and you flip battle cards > Scrap the first [K] card you flip without using its battle icons.

card.name: Slitherfang, Poisonous Protection
card.property: When this attacks > Do 1 damage to the defender after the battle.

alternate.name: UD-04 Globo Guard
alternate.property:
At the start of your turn > Do 1 damage to the upgraded character unless it is a [Quintesson].
When the upgraded character defends > Do 1 damage to the attacker after the battle.
If this would leave the battlefield > Put it into your KO area instead.

card.name: This Gun For Hire
card.property:
Your Shockblast, Galactic Man is a [Mercenary] instead of a [Decepticon].
When he is KO'd and you play his Upgrade side > Flip this.

alternate.name: This Gun For Hire
alternate.property: Your Astro Magnum is a [Mercenary] Weapon instead of a [Decepticon] Weapon. Remove the text "is a [Mercenary] and" from your Astro Magnum.

card.name: Tow-Line, Signals Engineer
card.property: When you play your first Action this turn > [Plan 1].

alternate.name: Tow-Line, Signals Engineer
alternate.property: When this battles and you flip [W][O][B] > You may put a face-up Action that was played in your played area into your hand after the battle.

card.name: Triggercon-Vention
card.property:
If you have Windsweeper, Air Defense and Crankcase, Data Collector on your starting team > Your starting [STAR] limit is increased by 4.
Replace the text “move 1 damage counter” with “move 2 damage counters” on the alt mode of your Windsweeper, Air Defense.

card.name: Up In Smoke
card.property:
Before the game begins > You may reveal a Smoke Cloak from your deck and put it in your hand.
Your Decepticon Exhaust, Consumptive Condottiere has [Pierce 2] for each Smoke Cloak and Smokethrower he is upgraded with.

card.name: V2 Sonicsurge Drone Armor
card.property: When your Raider Ravage, Espionage · Saboteur is untapped in alt mode and one of your other characters defends > You may tap Ravage. If you do, the defender gets +[DEF] until end of turn equal to Ravage’s [DEF] total.

card.name: Off-Road Cycle
card.property: When an Upgrade is scrapped from your Axor, Opportunistic Fencer > Place a fence counter on this. During your turn, when this has 2 or more fence counters, you may flip this and play it on him.

card.name: Verdant Aegis
card.property: While your Private Greenlight, Special Ops · Recon is in bot mode and she is upgraded with at least 3 [G] Upgrades, she can’t take more than 4 damage from a single attack.

card.name: Aspect of Laughter
card.property:
Put on [Quintesson] [Leaders] or [Quintesson] [Specialists] only.
If one of your cards would cause you to scrap one or more [G] cards from your hand > Instead scrap that many cards minus 1 from your hand.
